option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- Simple, clean summary report for equipment certificate (fields only) --> <jasperReport xmlns="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/jasperreports" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/jasperreports jasperreport.xsd" name="summary-report" pageWidth="595" pageHeight="842" columnWidth="515" leftMargin="40" rightMargin="40" topMargin="40" bottomMargin="40" uuid="summary-report-uuid"> <property name="ireport.zoom" value="1.0"/> <property name="ireport.x" value="0"/> <property name="ireport.y" value="0"/>
<parameter name="ReportNo" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="StNo" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="TsNo" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="JobNo" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Company" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Dte" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Ned" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Inspector" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Reviewer" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="Result" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="logoLeftPath" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="logoRightPath" class="java.lang.String"/>
<title> <band height="120"> <image> <reportElement x="0" y="0" width="100" height="60"/> <imageExpression><![CDATA[new java.io.File($P{logoLeftPath}).exists() ? $P{logoLeftPath} : ""]]></imageExpression> </image> <textField> <reportElement x="120" y="0" width="275" height="60"/> <textElement textAlignment="Center"> <font size="18" isBold="true"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA["Equipment Inspection - Summary"]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> <image> <reportElement x="420" y="0" width="100" height="60"/> <imageExpression><![CDATA[new java.io.File($P{logoRightPath}).exists() ? $P{logoRightPath} : ""]]></imageExpression> </image>
<line> <reportElement x="0" y="70" width="515" height="1"/> </line>
<!-- Key identifiers row --> <textField> <reportElement x="0" y="78" width="515" height="18"/> <textElement> <font size="12" isBold="true"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA["Report: " + ($P{ReportNo} == null ? "-" : $P{ReportNo}) + " | Sticker: " + ($P{StNo} == null ? "-" : $P{StNo})]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </title>
<detail> <band height="260"> <frame> <reportElement x="0" y="0" width="515" height="260"/>
<!-- Two-column key:value layout --> <staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="6" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Company:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="6" width="380" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Company} == null ? "-" : $P{Company}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="30" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Job No:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="30" width="200" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{JobNo} == null ? "-" : $P{JobNo}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="340" y="30" width="60" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[TS No:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="405" y="30" width="105" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{TsNo} == null ? "-" : $P{TsNo}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="56" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Inspection Date:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="56" width="200" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Dte} == null ? "-" : $P{Dte}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="340" y="56" width="60" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Next Date:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="405" y="56" width="105" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Ned} == null ? "-" : $P{Ned}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="86" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Inspector:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="86" width="380" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Inspector} == null ? "-" : $P{Inspector}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="110" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Reviewer:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="110" width="380" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Reviewer} == null ? "-" : $P{Reviewer}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<staticText> <reportElement x="0" y="134" width="120" height="18"/> <textElement> <font isBold="true"/> </textElement> <text><![CDATA[Result:]]></text> </staticText> <textField> <reportElement x="130" y="134" width="200" height="18"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{Result} == null ? "-" : $P{Result}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField>
<!-- Small footer note --> <textField> <reportElement x="0" y="210" width="515" height="40"/> <textElement textAlignment="Center"> <font size="9"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA["This summary contains general report information. For the full certificate and attachments use the provided link."]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </frame> </band> </detail>
<pageFooter> <band height="20"> <textField> <reportElement x="0" y="0" width="515" height="18"/> <textElement textAlignment="Right"> <font size="9"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA["Generated: " + new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm").format(new java.util.Date())]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </pageFooter> </jasperReport>
